Hi Sarah,

Happy Friday! I wanted to share a quick recap of where we stand on Project Falcon and outline what’s coming up next week.

Current Status
• Creative concepts – Finalized and now in production. Initial mock-ups look great.
• Media planning – ~80% complete. We’re on track to lock the final schedule early next week once we receive the last CPM quotes.
• Phase-2 test groups – Feedback has been very positive; the new marketing materials are resonating well with the target personas.

Upcoming Action Items
• Finalize media plan and circulate for sign-off (target: Tuesday EOD).
• Incorporate the tweaks you suggested for the social roll-out and review them in the Monday huddle.
• Confirm milestone dates for the overall project timeline and assign owners for each deliverable.
• Prepare the draft proposal package for internal review by 1 February.

Support Needed
If you have any concerns about the media mix or additional insights from the client side, let me know so we can fold them into the final plan. Otherwise, could you please confirm your availability for a 15-minute check-in either Monday 2:00-2:30 pm or Tuesday 10:00-10:30 am?

Thanks again for driving the marketing strategy – we’re in great shape heading into the final stretch.

Have a great weekend!

Best,
John
